tool_description: Validates products and shipments against international trade regulations, import/export restrictions, and licensing requirements for specific country pairs.

origin_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for origin

destination_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for destination

product_categories.description: Array of product categories being shipped

hs_codes.description: Array of HS codes for products

shipment_type.description: Type of shipment (commercial, personal, gift, sample, return)

error_messages: Invalid country codes: Provide valid two-letter ISO country codes for origin and destination.
Prohibited products detected: One or more products are prohibited for the destination country.
License required: Products require export/import licenses for this country pair.
Value threshold exceeded: Shipment value exceeds limits for the specified shipment type.
Missing documentation: Additional certificates or permits required for compliance.
Embargo restrictions: Trade restrictions are in place between the specified countries.
usage: Provide origin_country, destination_country, product_categories, shipment_value, and shipment_type. Optionally include specific hs_codes for more detailed compliance checking. Returns comprehensive compliance status and requirements.

required_certificates.description: List of required certificates or permits

restrictions.description: List of applicable restrictions or special requirements
